configuration.title: Salesforce Visualforce Configuration
visualforce.format.wrapLineLength.desc: Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).
visualforce.format.unformatted.desc: List of tags, comma separated, that shouldn't be reformatted. 'null' defaults to all tags listed at https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#phrasing-content.
visualforce.format.contentUnformatted.de: List of tags, comma separated, where the content shouldn't be reformatted. 'null' defaults to the 'pre' tag.
visualforce.format.preserveNewLines.desc: Whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved. Only works before elements, not inside tags or for text.
visualforce.format.maxPreserveNewLines.d: Maximum number of line breaks to be preserved in one chunk. Use 'null' for unlimited.
visualforce.format.extraLiners.desc: List of tags, comma separated, that should have an extra newline before them. 'null' defaults to "head, body, /html".
visualforce.format.wrapAttributes.auto: Wrap attributes only when line length is exceeded.
visualforce.format.wrapAttributes.forcea: Wrap each attribute except first and keep aligned.
visualforce.suggest.html5.desc: Configures if the Visualforce language support suggests HTML5 tags, properties and values.
visualforce.trace.server.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Visualforce language server.
visualforce.validate.scripts: Configures if the Visualforce language support validates embedded scripts.
visualforce.validate.styles: Configures if the Visualforce language support validates embedded styles.
